FlavorTextOption.Text: What?
We are reasonable and open to new deals. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens Trade)[/COLOR]
No trade happens in my empire without my approval. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens Trade)[/COLOR]
We are open to trade, as long as it benefits the citizens of our empire. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens Trade)[/COLOR]
For the right price we might be willing to trade with you. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens Trade)[/COLOR]
Through fair trade both of our empires can benefit. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens Trade)[/COLOR]
Our markets are the envy of the galaxy. Let us see how yours compare. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens Trade)[/COLOR]
Perhaps we can interest you in some aesthetically pleasing ordering of 0's and 1's? [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens Trade)[/COLOR]

Another race is nearing [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Ascension[/COLOR]. We do not know what lies beyond mortality, or what it means to follow the path of the precursors. But if they succeed, the prize will be theirs alone to claim. And we will be become little more than dust in the corners of the galaxy they leave us.
If we want to have any chance of ruling the galaxy, their attempt must be stopped.
Let's review victory status. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens the Victory screen)[/COLOR]
Give me a moment.

Another civilization is nearing a [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige Victory[/HS]. When the story of our galaxy is written the scholars will remark that they dominated this age, and we will be little more than a minor footnote.
If we want to have our legacy remembered we must act now.
Let's review victory status. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens the Victory screen)[/COLOR]
We will consider our options.
We welcome you, {PLAYERFACTION:2}.
Warm greetings, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. We do not know whether you are friend or foe. Only time can answer that. For now, we bid you peace.
So you are the {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Rumors have reached us of your kind. We will see soon whether you are a friend or an enemy.
I am told that you are called, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. This is very interesting to us. Whether we are destined to cooperate or seek mutual extermination remains to be seen.
Another potential slave race. We are always glad to meet new volunteers.
The galaxy seems to be filled with talking meat, {PLAYERFACTION:2}.
A pleasure to meet you. I do hope we can get this relationship off to a good start.
Hello preymeat. Have you come to present yourself for consumption by the Festron? Good. Goooood.
Salutations, travelers. Please let us proceed with opening conversational maneuvers.
Hello, hopefully not too villainous alien. We are the Mimot Brotherhood, and we are delighted to see you, and we are not delicious.
Another simple-minded alien, I presume. Twisted by your own childish sense of morality. Well. Let's not let that get between us.
Speak openly, alien, so that we might know you friend or foe.
We see hope in your eyes at this encounter. That will pass.
Your life, as you know it, is now over. Soon, you will be our slaves.
A new being. What a delight! No fear yet. The fire still in your eyes. Oh how fast that will change.
Greetings, and welcome. Our civilization has flourished for thousands of years. We know of powers that you cannot even imagine.
More fleshlings. I don't understand the concept of how meat can become sentient.
Before we begin to speak, stranger, I should tell you that my people will never be slaves again. Let us converse with that fact known.
You, alien. Are you the ones we fear and hate? The ones who stole our children? Or are you better? Or worse?
It's always a blessing meeting someone who has not yet found the way of the Krynn. It will be my pleasure to watch you come to understand the truth that we do.
Alien, know this: we were ancient when the universe was new. But we are now only a dim shadow of what we once were.
We are the true heirs of Altar. You will not stand in our way.
A pleasure to make your acquaintance. Let's all do our best to make this a mutually profitable encounter.
Greeting unhived, one. Why do you cross our viewports today?
Are you yet another animal? The galaxy is teaming with you. How interesting.
Greetings, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. {LEADERNAME:1}'s primary duty is to wipe you from the galaxy... Oh, and thanks for the Hyperdrive. It will make hunting you down that much easier.
A pleasure to meet you. I do hope we can get this relationship off to a good start.

Jesus Christ, what the hell are you?
You look absolutely monstrous. Sorry, sorry. I was just not expecting something out of my nightmares. Our diplomatic team will clean this up. How are you?
It is good to see you again. We hope we can unite the humans again under a single banner.
We welcome you to what we hope will one day be a united galaxy.
You are absolutely too cute to be real.
Based on your looks we must have a common evolutionary ancestor. We should meet and discuss this.
We are always happy to meet the Arcean civilization. We hope together we can build a better future.
The mighty Drengin Empire is once again on the move. Know that we will keeping a close eye on you.
We are delighted to meet what many here believe is a related species. We hope to work together with you for the betterment of the galaxy.
Ah, the robotic species known as {PLAYERFACTION:2}. We hope to work with you. If not, we will dismantle you.
We are glad to have had a small part in freeing you from the malevolent Drengin Empire. Now your destiny is in our hands.

You are the first space lobsters we've met.
Do not fear our terminology for it is scientific because I used the word space in front of lobster.

We have heard much of your civilization. We have studied a great deal of your lore and history.
Let me be the first to say "Live long and prosper."
Wonderful, a new market! The {PLAYERFACTION:1} look forward to serving... whatever you are.
Despite you looking quite menacing, we nevertheless hope that we can work together to build a friendship that will span the galaxy.
May our eggs find your many orifices
Your worm like bodies will make excellent hosts.
Your fur will make excellent hiding places for my eggs.
Your form is worthless to us. Only biological entities can store our eggs.
Salutations, travelers. Please let us proceed with opening conversational maneuvers. You may have discovered Hyperdrive but we discovered subspace streams.
We are pleased to meet another species, even one as adorable as you.
I assume you are the machine servant for an unseen master? Can you send for them?
Of all the timid species of the universe you alone knew the Precursors. It is tragic that you have lost their memory.
We travel the universe as explorers. But we are also traders. We are happy to meet you.
Hello, hopefully not too villainous alien. We are the Mimot Brotherhood, and we are delighted to see you, and we are not delicious.
You are absolutely frightening looking.
You look a lot like one of the species that evolved on our world. They were nice. They're dead now.
We hope we can be friends.
I have the distinct feeling that things are not going to end well in our dealings.
Yikes. You look scary.
We remember your civilization well. You were the ones who traded our people to the Drengin for their amusement and food needs.
Another simple-minded alien, I presume. Twisted by your own childish sense of morality. Well. Let's not let that get between us. I can assure you, the resemblance between us is merely superficial.
A disgusting bug creature. The universe could not be more ironic.
Space worms. Of course it would be a space worms.
We have pests like you on our home world. They may look cute but they are dangerous and deadly.
We have droids that look more useful than you.
Ah we are familiar with your species. You may find our way of doing business a little dangerous but in time you will appreciate the margins.
We continue to be grateful for your discovery of hyperdrive.

Ah so the Precursor's minions have returned to our area of space at last.
Something very dark must have driven your kind to cooperate together to this extent.
Our old rivals. We look forward to continuing to see who will dominate this galaxy.
You are the species that nearly wiped out the Iconians after the Precursor war. We respect that.
Your civilization has come far over these past centuries. We are glad that we taught you to build a stargate.
So you're a human. The ones who created the Hyperdrive technology. It will be a pleasure to meet you and have you for dinner.
Ah a species with promise.
We will show you mercy because you have discovered subspace streams.
We are glad to find your kind out in the wild. The nutty taste of your flesh is not quite the same as the ones grown on our farms.
You are practically ready to be cooked.
Ahh, you are the race with the same soft skin as the humans. Are you as dangerous as they are, I wonder?
So the rumors are true. There is a powerful species of murderbots in the universe. We respect that.
Have you returned to our area of the galaxy in the hopes to become our slaves again?
So the religious fanatics have made it to our part of space.

Ah to meet one of your kind face to face at last.
You no longer hide behind third-party agents. Good. The galactic peddlers will face our wrath if you attempt to swindle us.
Our prophecies foretold of this meeting, cousin. The mystery of our similar appearances may soon be unraveled.
We will not judge you based on how different you appear but rather on your actions.
You are all together new to us. We have great hope that we can exist together peacefully.
We hope to learn more about your delightful civilization.
Your reputation precedes you. We wish only for peace, for whatever that's worth to you.
We value all life, no matter what form it takes.
A pleasure to make your acquaintance. We trust you greet us with similarly peaceful intentions.
We have heard from legends that your race was lost after your service to the Precursors. We are glad to see that those legends were wrong.
It's always a pleasure to meet a potential new friend. We look forward to normalizing relations between our peoples.
Another example of talking meat. You actually flap a piece of meat to create sounds. Disgusting.
Your species may be something we can work with.

There were rumors that your species had recently organized to form a galactic civilization.
We are skeptical that you did this out of pure chance.
Nothing could have evolved that appears as you that doesn't have an ulterior motive.
We never expected to see your kind again.
We have little need for a species that exists merely to act as a conduit of goods and services for others.
Before we begin to speak, stranger, I should tell you that my people will never be slaves again. Let us converse with that fact known. If we find the Drengin, we will have our vengeance.
We were slaves of the evil Drengin Empire. We hope you are wary of them if you come into contact with them.
At last, we have found you. Driving you from our homeworld was only the first step on the road to annihilating you.
We have not forgotten how you used to sell the processed oils and bone of our people that the Drengin murdered to the minor civilizations in this sector.
Ah, we have heard rumors of the civilization that first invented the FTL device known as hyperdrive. We hope to learn more about you.
We are positively delighted to meet you. We are quickly expanding across the galaxy and hoping to make new friends.
You are a creature unknown to us. We will reserve judgement for now.
Ah, a new alien. Have you embraced THE WAY?
Your kind can still be uplifted by THE WAY.

We are a species that believes in a universal harmony. All civilizations will one day see this harmony or else.
We can see in your eyes that you will one day join us.
Extreme profit is a sin to our civilization. In time we will teach you THE WAY and you will find salvation.
Human, know this: we were ancient when the universe was new. But we are now only a dim shadow of what we once were. Our own robotic creations known as The Yor, rose up and took our homeworld.

It has been more than an age since we have encountered your kind. In the days when the Precursors strove the galaxy like giants we remember you with them.
Your kind always worked individually. Never before have you had any interest in gathering like this. We will find the reason.
We have learned in the dark years of our exile that things with large eyes cannot be trusted.
Ah the brutal Drengin Empire has returned to this part of space. You will find that we have little patience for species bent on conquest.
So at long last we meet again. We will take back our homeworld from you.

We are glad to meet you directly and not through your agents.
Your terraforming technology allowed us to burn out the native inhabitants of New Iconia.
You look like the beings who exiled us from our native planet. We will not suffer the same fate again.
Our legends tell of a species that traveled with the Arnor when we still lived on our first world. We never thought we would meet.
Your appearance almost seems like something out of a dream.

So the tainted Altarians have finally made it into the larger galaxy.
Know that we will eventually return to our homeworld that you stole from us.
You look like an abomination of a living thing.

We have longed to meet your civilization. We know you were driven from your homeworld by the wretched machines.
We were exiled from our homeworld by the evil Altarians whose very existence is an abomination.

At last you operate in the open. Our people sometimes miss acting as your agents when the need came to it.
Perhaps we can again come to an arrangement.
You humans reportedly are no strangers to driving a hard bargain. We look forward to negotiating many profitable deals with you.
Ah more humans. Your species is always surprising to us at how cunning you can be when trading.
We are happy and grateful to have met you. Your knowledge of these Subspace streams had vastly expanded our potential markets.

What a pleasure to meet you. We are a civilization that values things that have inherent value.
If you are ever of the mind of selling your own kind onto the open market, know that there is definitely an opportunity by working with us. Your adorable pelts would fetch a compelling price on the market.
Does your kind trade? We are a corporation looking to profit. Is there profit to be had with you?
The hive welcomes the humans to this part of space.
Our hive has begun to colonize the stars. We have seen many things. But never something quite as striking as you.
You are clearly impressive and distinctive from the other species of the galaxy. Perhaps there is a future for both of us.

Your face looks familiar to us. For many years, our surface world was ruthlessly harvested for precious metals and gems.
We never actually caught the beings who strip-mined our world before we were ready for the stars but you match the description.
Another animal. We assumed that the vastness of space would result in far more diversity. It is as if the gods were lazy.
You appear different from some of the others. We do not know how to classify your kind.
So the legends are true. Our ancient groves sang of beings such as you that explored worlds.
We are optimistic that we can grow together.
We are glad to finally meet something that isn't an animal. We are not quite sure what you are.
Your reputation for profit over the wellbeing of others is known to us. You will find no welcome ports with us.
Huh?
We are glad to meet you, {LEADERNAME:1}. May our civilizations work together for a better future.
I believe we can work together.
We greet you with a hope to the future.
We hope we can build a mutually beneficial relationship.
We are glad to have finally met.
I think you would find us difficult to digest.
Very well, same back to you.
You can be assured that we were not planning to eat you.
We hope we are able to work with you.
Greetings. Our relationship depends mostly on whether you will respect our territory.
I suspect we are not going to get along.
That is not at all ominous.
Looks can be deceiving.
You have nothing to fear. We have no intention of making you slaves..today.
I can assure you that we are probably maybe not a threat.
We have our own way.
That is a shame. We hope to build a better future with you.
You look like a dragon. Has anyone mentioned that?
Well, I do like money. A lot.
We look forward to building a better future with you.
An animal? As opposed to what? A plant or mineral? Right... a plant
We are glad to finally meet you.
You humans are supposed to be diplomatic. You have failed.
We will unite under my rule.
We are optimistic that we won't need to destroy you.
Don't let our cuteness fool you. We are also adorable.
I suspect it had more to do with ecomorphism.
The future remains to be seen, human.
We shall pluck those cow eyes out of your skull, human.
We are a more perfect version of you.
The flappings of talking meat are irrelevant.
Our destiny is ours. We shall forge it as we see fit.
Your diplomatic reputation precedes you.
Sigh.
We look forward to doing business.
Do not lay eggs in us.
Our insides are very acidic.
That is very gross.
You would do well to speak diplomatically to us.
Your nature is unimportant to us.
We are very impressed.
We have a natural fear of you. Our ancestors were preyed upon by beings like you.
This sounds very promising.
You are mistaken. We are the ultimate form of life.
Our creators, the Iconians, knew them. We inherited their world.
Our ports are always open.
We can assure you that we are not looking to eat you.
You will find our eggs comforting within your bodies.
We hope to show the universe to you.
We will definitely be killing your kind soon.
We are scary.
We all have to find a way to make a living.
Despite your attitude, we are willing to work with you.
The green hairless mammal has opinions.
You have us to thank for the subspace streams.
It must have been hard for you to say that. Thank you.
Bold words from a weak fleshling.
If we were capable of feeling amusement, your unearned arrogance would merit such a feeling.
As long as it's technically legal we are always happy to work with others.
Always pleased to speak to another civilized species.
You have no idea.
You would do well to learn some respect.
You're not in competition with us. You're not even in the game.
We don't require respect. Only obedience.
We hope to continue a mutual beneficial relationship with you.
We are not digestible. I'm just going to get that right out there.
There might be a future for you.
I don't think I like you.
It remains to be seen whether we will be friends or adversaries.
I suspect you say that to everyone.
Wouldn't you want to at least remove our hair?
There is more to us than what you can see.
You may be something we can work with.
We will never again serve you.
The Way is not a religion. It is a philosophy that brings many species together.
We would never dream of swindling one as noble and civilized as, eh, you.
I'm not really sure what to say to this.
We will reserve our judgement on you.
We know of your world from the Hiergemenon.
We feel the same about you, your blueness.
There is only one form of life.
We are open for business.
We have no problem working with robot people.
Robots make poor hatcheries for our eggs. Perhaps we can work together.
Our reasons are our own.
You sound like the other 5 sentient species that co-evolved with us.
You drove us from our home world.
I am sure you will need spare parts eventually.
We are obviously not Drengin.
We have no use for slaves. Your damaged eye intrigues us.
But we like everyone.
We left your world because there was nothing left of value.
You will have to prove you are more than slavelings.
You have to understand that Torian oils are a delicacy. If anything, we are the victims here.
We look forward to exploring the universe together.
You have a friend in us.
My advice to you is that you stay out of our way.
You will be able to judge us on our chara-excellent prices and sales.
We are open to new ideas.
We are not interested.
We shall see.
Our adorable eyes and sharp teeth greet you and your way.
We have no need for superstition.
We are big supporters of THE WAY. The statue of Kyndras is one of our best sellers.
You have nothing to fear from us.
Our reasons are our own.
Were those eyes at cute as ours?
Your civilization is already dead. You just don't know it yet.
We took your homeworld because you were too weak.
We are always here to help.
You seriously look like a dragon.
We have our own interests to attend to.
You may be a useful ally in what is to come.
That seems a little ironic coming from you.
We hope we can find a peaceful future together.
We are more alive than a fleshing ever could be.
Perhaps together we can both return to our homeworlds.
There is always work for a 3 meter tall dragon.
I believe you are a species we can do business with.
We shall see.
We are hopeful that we can forge a future together.
I'm not sure we are going to get along.
The laws of supply and demand are not bounded by biology.
That giant rifle doesn't look very welcoming.
A species that is made of stone is something new to us.
I am choosing to take that as a compliment.
That weapon you hold is impressive.
We deny ever stealing all the Nemandic gems from your sacred shrines.
We are different from the others.
We remember the sentient trees of your world when they were saplings.
That is not as heartwarming as you might have thought it sounded.
We were made to be beyond biology.
Our profits are what improves the wellbeing of the the universe.
Fake smile and nod as if you understand, then proceed to close the Incoming Message.
Space is big. Probably big enough for both of us.
Do not get in our way.
We are skeptical about ever becoming friendly.
Your claims are irrelevant to us.
We always enjoy talking to hairless apes.
Be careful or you may find yourself stepped on.
What the hell are you?
But are you cute.
We're going to murder you last.
Let's be honest, we're probably going to be foes.
We make look gentle on the outside, but don't mistake that for weakness.
I am pretty sure your grandfather was my chair.
There is no future for you.
We are the beings who will eventually use your bodies as hosts for our young.
It is doubtful our civilizations will ever reunite.
We are glad to have met you.
We are very cute if you ignore the bones and gore.
We have no interest in you or your so-called civilization.
Our past friendships do not affect our future.
We should work together. We have much in common.
We shall see, human.
Your words mean nothing to us.
Do not get in our way, human.
I still have hope we can work together.
We will bring everyone of your kind, except you, into The Way.
It appears we have common interests.
You can't lay eggs in us. Well, you probably could but don't.
Don't even think of it.
We had a species like yours on our planet. They're dead now.
Simply disgusting.
We literally eat your kind for breakfast.
The ramblings of talking bugs amuses us.
Your eggs will become our fuel.
We have dealt with far worse than you.
Very amusing.
We exterminated a species that looked similar to you long ago.
Your pitiful attempts at insults mean nothing to us.
We didn't forget the Precursors. They were before our time.
Hopefully we can find something that will serve your kind.
Only time will tell if you are delicious or not.
We will keep your species alive on farms.
Things that look harmless rarely are.
I wonder how difficult it will be to remove your fur.
We will convert you into a more useful biomechanical paste.
Are we to blame that your species tastes so good?
You will find that we are made of stern stuff.
Soft flesh on a hard skeleton is such an ineffective design.
We will uplift your machines to gain mastery over you.
We have little in common with a criminal empire.
There are things much worse than Dread Lords in this universe.
Your words mean nothing to us.
We remember you selling a stargate that would allow you to invade our homeworld.
We hope for peace. But we will also crush you if necessary.
You reek of malevolence
If anyone ever needed a good blasting, it's you.
We have very large and pointy teeth.
We do not require you to understand us. Only obey.
We will have our vengeance yet.
Our Jihad will consume you.
Remember that we still have agents. They simply perform a more lethal kind of business.
Prophecy or crude manipulation you mean.
Our actions involve laying eggs inside of you.
We know enough about you to be wary of your claims of wanting peace.
Your words mean nothing to us.
Well met.
You look like something out of a nightmare.
We have little experience with synthetic life forms.
We know what you did to the Iconians. You will find us a difficult foe if it comes to that.
We have little experience with synthetic life forms.
We have little experience with synthetic life forms.
We have little experience with synthetic life forms.
We have little experience with synthetic life forms.
We have little experience with synthetic life forms.
We have little experience with synthetic life forms.
We have little experience with synthetic life forms.
We have little experience with synthetic life forms.
We have little experience with synthetic life forms.
We will take back what is ours.
We have little experience with synthetic life forms.
We bring joy and happiness through our products. Something you obviously don't understand.
Your freedom or slavery remains to be seen.
We don't care.
Ah, Torians. I have a dozen of you frozen for the New Argon feast.
Your only value is your ability to populate quickly.
We suffered from the loss supply of your species.
You actually look like what I had for dinner yesterday.
We are definitely the stuff of nightmares.
Your words mean nothing to us.
I don't suppose you sell your children as a food commodity.
Eyes are high in fats that our young like.
You should just leave us alone.
Your words mean nothing to us.
Those who claim to be pure of heart are the biggest consumers of our less savory products.
You do not want to know what we know.
Are you leaving out the part that those eyes were evil robot eyes you created?
I will have your skull in my trophy case soon enough.
Empty words from a dying species.
We equally support natural and unnatural selection.
Your words mean nothing to us.
You may find you wished we never met.
Your villainous actions led to your exile. Own it.
You are a doomed relic of a dead past.
You were exiled because you lost your war of aggression. Our world was stolen. We are not the same.
We miss having you as one of our agents.
We don't trust you.
Eyes are high in fats that our young like. We are going to get along well.
Your greed won't save you from what is to come.
Maybe later.
We trade only when we can't take by force.
We are both quite different from the others.
I hope we can work together giant gun guy.
I doubt your species has a future at all.
We get that a lot.
Your bodies are useless to us. Be gone.
Only time will tell whether you will survive what is coming.
The 5 other species on our world thought the same thing.
Your words mean nothing to us.
We are hopeful we can still do business together.
Ibbu nesha sigu, wehu! (We've just conquered one of your planets.)
We've just conquered one of your planets.
We have liberated one of your worlds.
Our eggs have found a new home on one of your former worlds.
One of your worlds is now under our control.
We have freed one of your worlds from your ickiness.
We have set free the people of one of your planets.
We shall dine well tonight on the fools of your planet that we just conquered.
We can now share our wisdom with the people of the world we just took from you.
We have assimilated one of your worlds. Rejoice.
Your planet is now ours.
We can now share The Way with the people of your world that we just conquered.
Our investment in our military has paid off. Your planet now belongs to us.

Talotic yopitu mul nesin, {PLAYERFACTION:2}.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

The time for peace is over, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Prepare for war.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

It is time for your worlds to be commanded by a superior civilization. Prepare to die.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

A shame it had to end like this. There was so much promise in our relationship. Well. Know that although we do not like starting wars, we are very good at finishing them.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

War has come for you, preymeat. Soon you will be filled with sacs of eggs. Mentally prepare yourself.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

We do not run anymore, alien. We confront our enemies now. The time has come for war.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

We will not be dominated by anyone, ever again. We will become the dominators. And we will start with you.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

We are going to destroy you now, alien. Annihilate you utterly. Don't ask why. We don't have to explain our reasons to you.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

We have seen more war than most. We do not seek it, but when it is necessary, we do not shy from it. And we do not shy from war with you.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

We grow tired of the wet, slapping sounds you make when you speak, alien. When we eventually conquer you, we'll have to do something about that.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

We declare war. An abhorrent thought for our people, but we're prepared to make an exception for the likes of an abhorrent people like you.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

You call it war, we call it sanitizing the universe of vermin. Either way, your time has ended.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

It is time for you to stop terrorizing us. We are done having war brought to us. Now we bring it to you.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

This galaxy is filled with predators. We never thought we would become one ourselves. But we must, if we can rid the universe of your presence.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

Ideally, the way of the Krynn is spread by conversation and quiet reflection. Only in the rarest of circumstances must we resort to force. We do so now, alien.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

We are not instinctive warmongers. But we have seen enough of it for you to be very worried about what will happen when we bring war to you.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

We don't like being seen taking direct action ourselves. That we do so now, to destroy you, should tell you just how much you deserve it.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

It's normally better to profit from other civilization's wars, rather than your own. But we are willing to take a small loss if it means your death.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

Your actions have brought us to the steaming caldera of war, surface dweller. And now we take us in. The Onyx Hive will be the end of you.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

You have soiled the galaxy long enough, animal. We will stop you. All right-thinking plants will thank us.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

We cannot leave the galaxy at the mercy of space insects. Prepare to be exterminated
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

Deep down, you always knew that it would end with us at war.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

We have concluded that there is no future that ends well with a race of malevolent machines running loose. Therefore, we have decided to unplug you.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

We know what you truly are, human. You are, as your kind likes to say, a wolf in sheep's clothing.
Your facade of diplomacy and trade does not fool us. We will grind your bones into a fine powder.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

We wish there was another way but no other civilization has the wisdom to guide the galaxy as we do.
We will show you mercy once you utterly capitulate to us.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

Your kind is an abomination. There was never a scenario where we would allow machines to thrive in our galaxy.
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
You will regret this. Whatever you are.
You have made a fatal mistake.
We shall make you suffer for this.
You will be our slaves when this is over.
We are going to crush you.
Your worlds will soon be our property
We will convert your organs into fuel.
The only good bug is a dead bug.
This will be the last error your kind makes.
It's amazing something so cute can be soo foolish.
You have made a fatal error.
You are a dying race. We will speed your passing.
You will soon discover that we are very, very good at war.
I think you overestimate your wisdom and military might.
When we are done with you there will be no trace of your species left.
We will use what's left of you for spare parts.
You will find we are even worse than the Drengin.
We will boil you for dinner.
You will die, fanatic.
You will lose more than your homeworld when we're done.
It appears we must slay another beast.
We will loot what's left of your worlds.
You will be kindling for a bonfire when we are done with you.
I'm sorry?
Disappointing. But not a surprise.
So be it.
You will rue the day you declared war.
Please don't hurt us.
I wish we had found a way to do business together.
We knew we should never have expanded.
Your opinions are irrelevant. Soon, your entire species will be irrelevant.
Whatever you say, roach.
You will wish you had never been hatched.
We are very disappointed.
We are saddened that you have chosen death.
You have made a terrible mistake.
You have fallen away from logic.
So the slave now wants to be a slaver?
So the true nature of The Way is revealed.
You will lose.
We had hoped we could work together. Alas.
This will not be a profitable venture for you.
Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu. (You need to research Universal Translator)
Hey {PLAYERFACTION:2}, we're really tired of fighting. We ask for peace.
Hrm?
Very well.
Gahr flab tou metina! (You need to research Universal Translator)
Let us make the peace last for as long as it can.
How 'bout no?
It is far too late now.
Gahr flab tou metina! (You need to research Universal Translator)
We had hoped to avoid this needless bloodshed. But you have brought this on yourself.
Enoreset rir nenat ho carasal usecares ge tek seg sanas, {LEADERNAME:2}. Rihec {PLAYERRACE:2}'s toj ya dieno ces nomi?! (You need to research Universal Translator)
What brings you this way, alien?
Be quick, our time is valuble.
Humanity is united under one banner. We hope that others, including you, might join us.
Hmm. A being not filled with sacs of our eggs. What a shallow existence for you.
Greetings, lifeforms! What friendly, peer to peer conversation can we have today?
Hello, other one. What can you do for us today?
Pleasure to see you again, small alien. What can the Arcean Republic do for you?
Don't waste my time with meaningless words, scum. Make this worth my time.
Hello, alien. Did you know we pursue art and science with equal devotion? One is meaningless without the other.
Oh, good. Exchanging words with a biological lifeform. We love this.
Alien, before we talk, please remember: we trust you no more than we have to.
We have not had good experiences with aliens. We hope it will be different with you.
Have you found the way of the Krynn yet, alien? No? Ahh. Alas.
You are young in our eyes. Perhaps not so innocent though. So. What do you have to say for yourself?
We have seen betrayal before. We can smell it coming. Don't think you can trick us, alien.
We hoard nothing and delight in bringing the goods of the universe to those who desire them. For a reasonable profit, of course.
How do you live like you do? Do you not understand the beautiful simplicity of life in an asteroid? It is glorious.
It is always a delight for us when we can speak with an animal. You are so clever, sometimes.
We are always hungry. Therefore, speak quickly unless you want to become food.
We are pleased to see the humans. What would you like to talk about today?
Hello human. What sorts of trouble can we get into together today?
What can we do for you today, human?
It is a pleasure to see you, little human.
Ah the fleshling humans. It is good to see you up on your hind legs.
Are you ready to become our food again? You made such excellent slaves
We always enjoy talking to the humans. It is like looking into a mirror.
What is it you want today, fleshling?
What to the land loving humans want today?
No matter what we discuss today, know that this will not end until we have annihilated all of your kind.
Have you left our homeworld yet, robot?
Unless you are willing to give us Elemental, we will never truly have peace.
Enoreset rir nenat ho carasal usecares ge tek seg sanas, {LEADERNAME:2}. Rihec {PLAYERRACE:2}'s toj ya dieno ces nomi?! (You need to research Universal Translator)
Leave us, we are preoccupied at the moment.
Enoreset rir nenat ho carasal usecares ge tek seg sanas, {LEADERNAME:2}. Rihec {PLAYERRACE:2}'s toj ya dieno ces nomi?! (You need to research Universal Translator)
{LEADERNAME:2}! It is by your hand that 'The Everwar' began. And now you wish to talk? Begone.
Ah, {LEADERNAME:2} - the great bringer of 'The Everwar'. Did you light the Flames of War only to come asking for forgiveness? It is far too late for such things.
Your word lights the galaxy ablaze with War and now you come asking to trade? Are all {PLAYERFACTION:2} this foolish?
The Everwar' rages by your hand, {LEADERNAME:2}. May it cause your demise.
Enoreset rir nenat ho carasal usecares ge tek seg sanas, {LEADERNAME:2}. Rihec {PLAYERRACE:2}'s toj ya dieno ces nomi?! (You need to research Universal Translator)
{LEADERNAME:2}! The galaxy has turned against you. You will not survive the tide. Begone.
Enoreset rir nenat ho carasal usecares ge tek seg sanas, {LEADERNAME:2}. Rihec {PLAYERRACE:2}'s toj ya dieno ces nomi?! (You need to research Universal Translator)
{LEADERNAME:2}! The Apocalypse has begun. The time for diplomacy is past.
Erasuto ki nakeduc menurit! {LEADERNAME:2}, lesasa uwetadel ise neforal {PLAYERFACTION:1} babenat adonecie si podotic! (You need to research Universal Translator)
Very well, let's trade.
This is acceptable.
Agreed.
This works.
{PLAYERFACTION:1}, obis iwiwilam oce geme {LEADERNAME:2}. Oti rini pe roni oten latuher ver inegur! (You need to research Universal Translator)
This offer is not acceptable.
No.
This won't work for me
We need more.
This is the kind of offer I'd expect one of my slaves to make.
Your offer is what I would expect of an organic.
I laugh at your offer.
Do you take us for fools? Try harder.
This offer makes me sad.
I don't like this offer.
Unacceptable.
A pitiful excuse for an offer.
If you were not across that screen I would kill you where you stand for this offer.
I should gut you for suggesting this proposal.
Your offer is contemptible.
This offer does not fit our parameters.
This offer offends our ancestors.
Inibero opilide bo somufat nunor pieta oril! (You need to research Universal Translator)
I'm glad we could come to an agreement.
This was a good day.
I am glad we could come to an agreement.
We are pleased with this result.
This agreement furthers our plans.
Hooray. We are so happy!
This is acceptable.
We toast you for a successful negotiation.
Our agreement is concluded.
You may live. For now.
This is barely acceptable but I have no more time to waste.
This will work for us. For now.
We are pleased we could come to an arrangement.
We compute that this is an equitable agreement.
Thank you for this.
Our business is concluded.
The Way has been served.
It is a pleasure doing business with you.
La yol ele po. Sa riras tenalac hasec? (You need to research Universal Translator)
What do you have in mind?
I am interested in seeing your proposal.
Let us see what you propose.
Inibero opilide bo somufat nunor pieta oril! (You need to research Universal Translator)
We are interested in trading this with you.
You have some things we want and we have some things we think you will like.
Ahh. My delightful alien counterpart. The Terrans have an offer for you.
We have a mutually beneficial offer for you, preymeat.
Do you wish to share wisdom with us? We wish to share it with you.
We have something that you want and you have something that we want. What a happy day!
We have a trade offer for you, alien. It's extremely beneficial for us. Does anything more need to be said?
Let us share with each other, as all prudent civilizations do.
We normally take what we want from pathetic worms like you. But now here we are offering something in return. Surprising.
We would like to share our great, Altarian wisdom with you. We require only a triviality in exchange.
Perhaps we can interest you in an aesthetically pleasing ordering of 0's and 1's?
Here is an exchange we propose, alien. It is a good one, fair and true.
We are wary of others. Even of you. We request this trade under cautious terms.
Even if you have not yet found the way of Krynn yourself, that does not mean we cannot share with each other.
We have forgotten more than you will ever learn, alien. But we have not forgotten this wisdom we wish to trade with you now.
We have a trade offer for you. It is simple and easy to understand on the surface. You should have no misgivings.
We share nothing freely, but the terms we offer you today are mighty close.
You have many interesting things we desire, unhived one. Let us trade for them.
You are clever, for animals. We wish to do trade with you.
I don't know what you're saying, but it's probably hostile. Prepare for war!
The time has come to destroy you.
It is time for you to die.
This war is tiring. I wish we could work past our differences... (you need to research Universal Translator in order to negotiate for peace)
Let's negotiate a peace treaty.
Let's come to terms.
Let gelomoh elurecus ela!
Very well, consider us at war.
Then it is war.
So be it. War it is.
Gar lutzo bagh!
We aren't interested in talking to you.
I guess you don't feel like talking.
Goodbye.
Farewell.
Blar bagh?!
You will regret this.
You have chosen death.
Yeah, you heard me! Also, you sound dumb!
Yeah, you heard me!
Sorry, just kidding. You couldn't understand me... right?
Nevermind.
Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu. (You need to research Universal Translator)
Our time is precious, but we are always interested in working with the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} under the right circumstances.
We are very busy but we always have time for the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}.
We are very hungry. Very, very hungry. If you are wasting our time, you will need to compensate us with the only currency you have.
We are busy exploring the universe but we can spare a little time for the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}.
Being this cute takes a lot of time but then again what's the point of being cute if you can't spend a little time talking to the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}.
What more would you like to discuss with me?
Be brief or be dead.
What can we do for the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} today?
Enter input.
What additional topics would you like to talk about?
What else do you need?
Are you ready to be saved now?
What else can there be to discuss?
You are testing our patience!
What other topic that might be profitable would you like to discuss?
Speak.
We have the patience of the great grove. But our patience isn't endless.
Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu. (You need to research Universal Translator)
We would like to publicly proclaim our never ending friendship for you.
Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu. (You need to research Universal Translator)
Remove your ships from our territory immediately.
Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu. (You need to research Universal Translator)
The cost of policing space is not trivial. We would like you to contribute to help cover our expenses.
Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu. (You need to research Universal Translator)
We require financial help. Please give it to us.
Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu. (You need to research Universal Translator)
We would like to offer you financial aid, with the hope that it will strengthen our relationship.
Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu. (You need to research Universal Translator)
Perhaps some other time.
Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu. (You need to research Universal Translator)
We accept your expression of friendship with the value it is worth.
Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu. (You need to research Universal Translator)
We hope our relationship will grow even closer in the future.
Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu. (You need to research Universal Translator)
{LEADERNAME:2}, we are sorry that our ships have made you nervous. We will ask them to leave your territories immediately.
Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu. (You need to research Universal Translator)
Your cooperation is greatly appreciated.
Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu. (You need to research Universal Translator)

{LEADERNAME:2}, it is a very large galaxy. We cannot afford to waste time avoiding your territory because you are paranoid. Our ships will continue their missions; we suggest you do not get in their way.
Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu. (You need to research Universal Translator)
They had better be careful, or you will find yourself with a smaller fleet.
THIS SHOULD NEVER HAPPEN (translator missing)
We are willing to pay for security, for the time being. We have more important issues that require our attention. I do not recommend you push your luck any further.
Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu. (You need to research Universal Translator)
As long as you keep the credits coming, we will not have a problem.
Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu. (You need to research Universal Translator)
We have no interest in paying you to leave us in peace. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} will not forget this attempted extortion. You will regret it if you continue to pester us.
Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu. (You need to research Universal Translator)
OK, but don't blame us if one of your ships should have an 'accident'.
Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu. (You need to research Universal Translator)
The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} has been a friend to us in the past. We are willing to help you in your time of need.
Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu. (You need to research Universal Translator)
We are very grateful. We will not forget your generosity.
Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu. (You need to research Universal Translator)

We are sorry, but we cannot vindicate assisting you at this time. Perhaps if we had closer relations we could find the funds... but as things stand, we think we are better off keeping our assets to ourselves.
The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} have struggled with technological progress recently, {LEADERNAME:2}. Would you please share the knowledge of {TECHNAME:2} with us?
We are great admirers of your technological capabilities. Would you be willing to share {TECHNAME:2} with us?
No matter how much we torture our slaves, they cannot seem to grasp {TECHNAME:2} technology, {LEADERNAME:2}. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} would appreciate you sharing this technology with us.
The gods have not seen fit to give us the secret of {TECHNAME:2} technology, {LEADERNAME:2}. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} would appreciate you sharing this technology with us.
We are always willing to help a friend.
Very well, we are glad to help.
We won't forget this. Thank you.
This will help our people immensely.
Thank you for your help.
This knowledge is too dangerous to share.
The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} are suffering an economic setback, {LEADERNAME:2}. Would you be willing to give us {AMOUNT:2} credits to help us?
We are finding our treasury stretched thin due to recent internal... incidents. We would appreciate it if you could give us {AMOUNT:2} credits to help fund this year's budget.
The people of the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} need money to help the war effort, {LEADERNAME:2}. Please support us with {AMOUNT:2} credits to help pay for it.

I won't lie to you, {LEADERNAME:2}. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} really like money. A lot. We dream of it. We sleep with it. We...well, we do a lot of things with it. And we need more. A lot more. It would help our relations if you gave us {AMOUNT:2} credits.

Our ongoing research is expensive, {LEADERNAME:2}. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} is asking you for {AMOUNT:2} credits so that we can continue to invest in new technology. Doing so will benefit our relationship.

We are wary of outsiders, {LEADERNAME:2}. However, the people of {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} find themselves struggling a little bit. If you could provide us with {AMOUNT:2} credits it would strengthen our bond.
We are always willing to help. Well, not always but at least this time.
We appreciate your help.
Thank you.
We will not forget this act of generosity.
We don't have enough money to help you.
They are far too powerful.
We have enough of that resource.
